<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Premonition of Avoidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1696) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw against a hazard, but you haven't rolled yet.

</column>

---

Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw.

<title level="2">Premonition of Avoidance leads to...</title>
[Shared Avoidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1703)
name: Premonition of Avoidance
